field.name: $viewerTag
field.viewer: Unrenewed Prototype

field.name: invoiced
field.viewer: Invoiced Partially invoiced Not invoiced

field.name: deliveryState
field.viewer: Not delivered Partially delivered Delivered

attribute.name: value
attribute.expr: eval: id && __repo__(StockMoveLine).all().filter('self.saleOrderLine.id = ? AND self.stockMove.availabilityRequest = TRUE AND self.stockMove.statusSelect = 2', __self__?.id).count() > 0

field.name: $isReadOnly
field.expr: eval: saleOrder?.statusSelect == 2 || saleOrder?.statusSelect == 3 && (!saleOrder?.orderBeingEdited || (exTaxTotal && exTaxTotal != 0 && amountInvoiced == exTaxTotal) || availabiltyRequest) || saleOrder?.statusSelect == 4

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: "(self.product.id = ${product?.parentProduct?.id} OR self.product.id = ${product?.id}) AND self.defineSubBillOfMaterial = true AND self.personalized = false "

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: self.isModel = false and (self.endDate = null or self.endDate > :__date__) and self.sellable = true

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: "self.isModel = false and (self.endDate = null or self.endDate > :__date__) and self.sellable = true AND ${_parent?.tradingName?.id} member of self.tradingNameSellerSet"
